thread.title: Students make cafe worker's Disney dream come true
thread.title_full: Students make cafe worker's Disney dream come true

title: Students make cafe worker's Disney dream come true
text:
Students make cafe worker's Disney dream come true Last updated 10:43, October 14 2015 Elon Local News/YouTube 
Kathryn Thompson always wanted to bring her family to Disney World, but was never able to afford it. 
A US woman's lifelong dream to take her family to Disney World has come true, thanks to some generous students. 
Kathryn Thompson, of North Carolina, works at the on-campus cafe at Elon University. 
As Life and Style Mag reported , it had long been Thompson's dream to take her son, daughter-in-law and two grandsons to Disney World but she had never been able to afford it. YOUTUBE 
Two students from Elon University make Kathryn Thompson's dream come true. 
READ MORE: * Disney World and Disneyland push ticket prices 
One night while at work, Thompson revealed her wishes to two Elon students, in conversation. 
After that, the students hatched a plan to make Thompson's Disney dream come true, They set up a GoFundMe page and set the goal to $US6,500 (NZ$9800). 
In just three weeks, the girls raised the money and were able to tell Thompson the good news.
